author: calixtorontocalix
title: Feature Film 👉Onboarding Hollywood
description: How do we onboard mainstream entertainment studios into Cardano & become the best in class ecosystem for high value entertainment projects?
solution: Phase 1: Creation of a large scale feature film to showcase Cardano, Catalyst and ultimately attract studio partners into Cardano Creatives.
experience:
Proposers: combined 38 yrs entertainment industry experience.
Dozens of film industry partners to work alongside the EP team.
